channel.title: How do i stop the mass clicking when attacking an npc in testscape!?
channel.description:
Does anyone know how to slow down the mass clicking when you attack an npc i want to make it so that it will hit once everytime you hit
Please help! <3

item.title: How do i stop the mass clicking when attacking an npc in testscape!?
item.dc:creator: @legendzpker legendzpker
item.description:
@legendzpker wrote:

change the wep delay time

item.title: How do i stop the mass clicking when attacking an npc in testscape!?
item.dc:creator: @Slivion Slivion
item.description:
@Slivion wrote:

You can do it the hard way.

When you think someone is Mass Clicking check there Stat.
Then check it in another minutes time.
If it’s up alot, then you know.

Read full topic
